title: Love Island's Molly-Mae and Tommy Fury work up a sweat during boxing session

Love Island's Molly-Mae Hague and Tommy Fury have spent their Sunday in the gym together.

The social media influencer and boxer, both 20, teamed up for a couples sweat session which they shared with their Instagram followers.

Proving Molly-Mae is hoping to learn a thing or two from her sportsman beau, the blonde beauty donned a pair of boxing gloves as she gave a boxing bag a hammering and ran around the hanging bags.

Mocking her skills, Tommy wrote alongside the snap shared to his stories "gym time with this idiot" alongside a crying with laughter emoji and heart icon.

(Image: Instagram)

Molly later shared one where she claimed: "I promise I am not distracting him" as they appeared to be dancing about in some fun footage shot inside the work-out area.

Tommy went shirtless for their fitness date and dressed in a pair of tiny black shorts, Molly opted for figure-hugging leggings and a black zip-up sweater.

On Monday night, the reality TV couple put on a glamorous display as they walked the red carpet at The Mirror's Animal Hero Awards.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Molly worked a fierce pout as she smoldered for the cameras solo before boyfriend Tommy joined in by wrapping a tight arm around her.

Influencer Molly was clad in an elegant asymmetrical gown while Tommy looked ultra sharp in a black and navy tuxedo.

Molly-Mae and Tommy fell for eachother on this summer's Love Island and came in second on the show's final.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: PA)

Since the romance show ended the couple have gone from strength to strength and recently moved into a plush penthouse apartment in Manchester together.

Molly-Mae is currently using her new found fame to launch an anti-trolling campaign to show people just how damaging their nasty social media comments can be.

description: They say a couple that train together, stay together and the Love Island duo are not afraid to work out as a pair
